item.title: Academic Road Studio, Tsinghua University | 清华大学学术之路工作室
item.description: I am a senior lecturer at the Academic Path Studio at Tsinghua University. You can make an appointment with me through the WeChat Shuimuhui applet (#applet://Shuimuhui/v1pWqFBPOfO7fFc). My main consulting area is computational social science. Academic Road Studio is a one-stop scientific research skills service platform for all graduate students of Tsinghua University. The official account is dedicated to meeting the basic course learning, basic skills of scientific research entry and individualized academic needs of postgraduates of different majors, and solves the problems encountered in the process of postgraduate scientific research and study in the most convenient way.
